tool_description: Anchor Data Scrapper is the easiest way to get access to podcasts from a specific user in a JSON format.
title: Anchor Data Scrapper

api_list.name: Get Podcast episodes
api_list.description: Get Podcast episodes with Audio, image, description using the username of the podcast.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description:
The username of the anchor podcase user for example:
https://anchor.fm/**financialfreedomtribe**

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anchor-data-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com/episodes/{username}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anchor-data-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

episodes.Name: Gareth Daine. The Power of SEO. Episode 3
episodes.Description:
In this episode we welcome Gareth Daine from the UK. A veteran SEO with more than 13 years of experience in the field.

We talk about how competition should be seen as a positive thing when entering crowded markets and WHY.

We talk about consistency and the love of what you do help you achieve any goal you set your mind to.

So make sure you listen in.

episodes.Name: Episode 2 of the Financial Freedom Tribe Podcast
episodes.Description:
Today we have the honor to talk with a bona fide Email Marketing expert - Gabriella Mischel Rapone from Montreal in Canada. 

We talk about how important email is, no matter what kind of online business that you work on. 

Ecommerce, information product, agency owner or even if you're an affiliate who promotes other people's products. 

No matter what you do, email marketing is crucial to your success and your bottom line.

episodes.Name: Episode 1 of the Financial Freedom Tribe Podcast
episodes.Description:
This is the very first episode of the Financial Freedom Tribe Podcast. A small introduction by yours truly.

If you're into SEO, email marketing, Organic traffic from social media and you're building your website or business online, you should subscribe to this podcast.

There is a small surprise announcement in there, so make sure you catch it!
